Html:
I know there is GradientNavigationButton but i still need a button control with gradient posibilities and DialogResult. I saw for version1.5 aqua render mode, that could be verry nice on buttons. It's possible to use an image to display as 'gradient', 'surface' or 'background' for button, or to set as pattern ?

Thanks,
Paul

Here's a set of controls that look nice

RibbonMenuButton
http://www.codeproject.com/cs/miscctrl/TheNewRibbonMenuButton.asp

RibbonForm, RibbonRoundButton, and FastMenu
http://www.codeproject.com/cs/miscctrl/RibbonFormRoundButton.asp

Office2007 panels with fading and opacity
http://www.codeproject.com/cs/miscctrl/Office2007_Panels.asp

Ribbon Panel Office 2007 style
http://www.codeproject.com/cs/miscctrl/Ribbon_Panel.asp

office2007 buttons with fading and opacity
http://www.codeproject.com/useritems/Office2007Style_Button.asp
